name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red

reviews.name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red
reviews.reviewText: This will be a great addition to my grandsons room !
reviews.title: Perfect for my Grandson

reviews.name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red
reviews.reviewText: It's not sturdy and serves a 10 year old better than a 5 year old but it's definitely worth the money. I especially like the little lid. I would recommend to anyone who has a son into Spider-Man
reviews.title: Economical and trendy

reviews.name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it. .. Great Price
reviews.title: exactly how it looks

reviews.name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my one year old to store his clothes in.. It is very sturdy considering the fact that he plays with it sometimes. Its actually bigger than I thought .. If it was ever damaged I would buy it all over again! Worth the money!!!
reviews.title: love it

reviews.name: Marvel Spider-Man Pop-Up Hamper with Dome Lid, Red
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson to complete his Spiderman room and guess what? He loved it!, me not so much only because it is very cheap and flimsy. The wire poked out of the lid after 2 minutes of supervised use. if this cost more than $10 I would return but I guess you get what you pay for. It does look good in his room and he gladly throws his wash in the hamper now.
reviews.title: cute but cheap
